content: description the poppy cardigan is the sister design to the poppy pullover this crochet cardigan is designed for an oversized fit with a subtle v-neck shape and rolled short sleeves it features cute side slits and has amazing drape the pattern is beginner friendly and includes 9 sizes plus a video tutorial for easy stitching this pattern is free on my blog 1 grab the poppy cardigan as a kit from lion brand 2 the kit comes with all the yarn you need to make your cardigan plus a free copy of the printable pdf pattern you can even customize your yarn color i have a full video tutorial available for this pattern 3 1 https //www eandpcrochet com/the-poppy-cardigan-crochet-pattern/ 2 https //shrsl com/45ajf 3 https //youtu be/v9343ytesn0
